placeHolders.declaration-warning-description: Something seems odd with your declaration. Do you want to submit it anyway? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.declaration-submit-description: Do you want to proceed and submit your declaration? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.noProject-declaration-low-warning: Your declaration under condition No Project is empty: it might result in a massive loss
placeHolders.noProject-declaration-high-warning: Your declaration under condition No Project is greater than the known maximum value, this is certainly not optimal.
placeHolders.projectA-declaration-low-warning: Your declaration under condition Project A is empty: it might result in a massive loss
placeHolders.projectA-declaration-high-warning: Your declaration under condition Project A is greater than the known maximum value, this is certainly not optimal
